item.title: Ruud Erie | Developer & Entrepreneur
item.description:
Ruud Erie | Developer & Entrepreneur

Ruud is an international investor, software developer and entrepreneur.

item.title: Soulection Radio Show #243 (Live from Rio de Janeiro, Brasil) by SOULECTION
item.description:
Soulection Radio Show #243 (Live from Rio de Janeiro, Brasil) by SOULECTION

▶ Soulection ~ The Sound of Tomorrow ▶ Watch our Interview Sessions: youtube.com/soulection ▶ facebook.com/soulection | twitter.com/soulection ➜ Show #243 Track List: bit.ly/Show243TrackList ▶ Discover: @joekay @sangobeats This trip to Brasil changed our lives. We were only there for 6 days but we played 4 shows in Brasilia, Curitiba, São Paulo , & Rio de Janeiro.
